channel.title: CNET News
channel.description: CNET news editors and reporters provide top technology news, with investigative reporting and in-depth coverage of tech issues and events.

item.title: Fisker Ocean electric SUV revealed and it's cheaper than a Tesla Model 3 - Roadshow
item.description: Making its debut at CES 2020, the Fisker Ocean SUV will cost $37,499 before the available tax credit, or you can lease it for $379 per month.
item.dc:creator: Steven Ewing

item.title: BMW CES concept shows how autonomous cars will change luxury as we know it - Roadshow
item.description: The i Interaction Ease concept shows off a cockpit from a time after self-driving cars have become mainstream.
item.dc:creator: Sean Szymkowski

item.title: BMW ZeroG Lounger seat is one comfy seat with a cocoonlike airbag - Roadshow
item.description: Unlike BMW's fancy self-driving car concept, this is totally going into production in the X7 SUV.
item.dc:creator: Sean Szymkowski

item.title: Tesla Model Y will be built in China, and the news sent Elon Musk dancing - Roadshow
item.description: The CEO also shared that Tesla will design new models locally for sale around the world.
item.dc:creator: Sean Szymkowski

item.title: Impossible Foods' pig-free pork is here, and it's scary-similar to the real thing - CNET
item.description: Following the success of its plant-based burger substitute, Impossible Foods debuts its latest lab-created meat invention.
item.dc:creator: Abrar Al-Heeti

item.title: FBI asks Apple to help unlock iPhones of suspected Navy base shooter, report says - CNET
item.description: The iPhone maker has wrangled in the past with the FBI over unlocking devices.
item.dc:creator: Carrie Mihalcik

item.title: The Y-Brush returns: You can finally buy the 10-second toothbrush now - CNET
item.description: The strange-looking toothbrush promises a super short brush time. You can now buy one for $125.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Holland

item.title: Forget the Asus ROG Phone 2, the Black Shark 2 Pro game phone wants all your PUBG - CNET
item.description: The ridiculously specced gaming phone makes a rare US appearance at CES and we got to spend a little time with it.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Holland

item.title: A company you've never heard of just launched the cheapest 5G phone yet - CNET
item.description: Coolpad's Legacy 5G phone costs just $400.
item.dc:creator: Lynn La

item.title: MediaTek brings 5G to less-expensive phones with Dimensity 800 chips - CNET
item.description: The processors from the Taiwanese company will be in phones the first half of this year.
item.dc:creator: Shara Tibken

item.title: The Razer Eracing Simulator probably costs more than your car - CNET
item.description: This insanely immersive video-game setup includes motorized seat movement and a huge curved projection screen.
item.dc:creator: Dan Ackerman

item.title: Impossible Foods fake bacon is 'definitely on track' - CNET
item.description: But you won't get a taste until Impossible Bacon proves it can gratify even the "most hardcore bacon worshipper," Impossible Foods CEO said.
item.dc:creator: Joan E. Solsman

item.title: Instagram, Oculus and WhatsApp are missing from Facebook's privacy booth at CES - CNET
item.description: The social network doesn't address privacy tools for other apps it owns.
item.dc:creator: Queenie Wong

item.title: TiVo cuts the cable TV cord with the $49 Stream 4K box - CNET
item.description: It's not a DVR, it's a streamer running Android TV and designed to partner with the Sling TV service.
item.dc:creator: Ty Pendlebury

item.title: All of the home security cameras at CES 2020 - CNET
item.description: There are security cameras galore at this year's big tech conference.
item.dc:creator: Megan Wollerton

item.title: The 5G phone anyone can afford will sell this year for under $500 - CNET
item.description: It's called the TCL 10 5G and it will go on sale in the US and other countries in 2020.
item.dc:creator: Jessica Dolcourt

item.title: This scooter from Unagi can be customized exactly how you like it - CNET
item.description: Like a Nike sneaker, you can make the Unagi Model One E500's handlebar and deck any color you want.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Kaminski

item.title: Get Carpool Karaoke in your own car, thanks to a new device called Roxie - CNET
item.description: James Corden not included.
item.dc:creator: Alison DeNisco Rayome

item.title: Samsung just debuted a bezelless 8K TV that is 99% picture - CNET
item.description: The Q950TS has a practically bezel-free QLED screen that goes right up to the edge.
item.dc:creator: David Katzmaier

item.title: The prettiest new phone from CES will cost you under $500: Meet the TCL 10 Pro - CNET
item.description: The triple camera TCL 10 Pro is so arresting, it's easy to forget how affordable it is.
item.dc:creator: Jessica Dolcourt

item.title: 2020 Mini John Cooper Works Clubman All4 is a pocket rocket - Roadshow
item.description: With hot-hatch horsepower and some sprightly characteristics, the JCW Clubman is a hoot.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Krok

item.title: Samsung's Galaxy Chromebook has a 4K UHD AMOLED display and costs $1,000 - CNET
item.description: Co-engineered with Intel for Project Athena, the Galaxy Chromebook sounds like a seriously great device.
item.dc:creator: Joshua Goldman

item.title: Samsung's Galaxy Home Mini speaker may be nearing release - CNET
item.description: After months of speculation, the Home Mini may soon go on sale.
item.dc:creator: Eli Blumenthal

item.title: CES 2020: LG reveals ThinQ AI ambitions for smart home appliances, 8K OLED TVs - CNET
item.description: The company's LG ThinQ will apparently figure out when appliances like its washer need maintenance and if you're using them wrong.
item.dc:creator: Sean Keane

item.title: At CES 2020, Neofect makes rehab fun and engaging for stroke survivors - CNET
item.description: Neofect Smart Balance is a Dance Dance Revolution-like device for rehabilitation of your legs, balance and posture
item.dc:creator: Patrick Holland
